info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:52PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Ravalli County through 415 PM MDT... At 349 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Darby to 6 miles southeast of Conner to 15 miles north of Gibbonsville. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Localized flooding from heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Darby, Conner, and Sula. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 4 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
